content: I am wondering if there is any other FHIR client GUI implementations, besides HAPI FHIR (http://fhirtest.uhn.ca/home?serverId=home_21&pretty=true), that can be used to access FHIR resources.
clinFHIR (http://clinfhir.com/ ) has a patient viewer and simply query tool that may be of interest...

For full-stack Javascript implementations, there's also the Clinical Meteor's clientApplication prototype, and Meteor on FHIR.
https://github.com/clinical-meteor/hl7-argonaut-fhir/tree/master/examples/clientApplication
https://github.com/clinical-meteor/meteor-on-fhir
Is this the stuff that we were talking about at the implementer's birds of a feather?
